channel.title: 317 Client Help
channel.description:
Can some 1 please help me with my client, efrytime i log and i do 2/3steps my client closes. I tryd to convert the Run file but that didnt work:( i have a 64 bit. windows 7 Acer Aspire Predator.
Oh btw. this is the run file,
@echo off title Client java -Xmx256m client 10 0 highmem members 32 exit
Thank you to the guy that is goin to help me<3

item.title: 317 Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Pkz_Kingz Pkz_Kingz
item.description:
@Pkz_Kingz wrote:

[quote=“jobo, post:1, topic:367866”]Can some 1 please help me with my client, efrytime i log and i do 2/3steps my client closes. I tryd to convert the Run file but that didnt work:(
i have a 64 bit.
windows 7
Acer Aspire Predator.

Oh btw. this is the run file,

@echo off
title Client
java -Xmx256m client 10 0 highmem members 32
exit

Thank you to the guy that is goin to help me<3[/quote]

you just need for window 7 to change to Run.cmd or thing like that in .exe whit a converter… i hope this will help you ;D

item.title: 317 Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

try this for your run.bat:

@echo off title Client "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx256m client 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT

Read full topic
